name: Four Wheel Drive
description:
This game is playable with 4 people 
Gamepad is highly recomended for this game

Four rowdy pals wanted to make the most awesome car ever, but each of them wanted to be the driver and had a different idea on how the car should look like and thus 4WD was born!

Each person controlls an individual wheel steer together to gather the blue orbs to get the most points

This game was made during The Splash Jam 2017
